author: deguio
body:
Move dqm begin run before bookHistograms. The DQMEventInfo class and what was included in @2235 have been updated accordingly.
documentation updated:
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/ThreadedDQM#How_to_migrate_the_code_The_DQME
title: Move dqm begin run before booking
